name: Growing battle
description:
I choose the theme : "Growing" because the other don't inspired me.

/!\ It's a local multiplayer game, so take a friend with you /!\

You are buckets and you're goal is to grow you're flower. But the problem is : you're beautiful flower is in your ennemy (or your friend at this moment) area. Fill your bucket with the water drop and kill the other bucket to walk toward.

I was inspire by Nidhogg to make this game, it's more basic than Nidhogg but some mecanics are used by this game

So good luck and have fun !
